root: ^Hey! If it isn't Nicholas! What can I do for you, pal?
^Just wanted to have a look around.

c-0: ^I'm here for this. I left my watch with you a few days ago?

give_ticket: ^A few days? You left this with me 3 months ago, remember?
^You've just been renewing your loan each month since then.
^Oh right. I have a lot going on right now, I must've forgot.
^Well, hope you didn't forget you need to repay everything. Total plus interest is $43. You have enough?

c-0: ^Perfect. Let me get that watch for you.
c-1: ^Well, you remember how this works right?
^I loaned you $30 for your watch, and to get it back, you have to repay the loan plus interest and fees.
^Come back with $43, and you can get it back right away, ok?
